member_organisations: IVA is a swedish royal national academy with approximately 1300 distinguished national and international fellows from the academic, industrial and public sectors.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Taxation, Youth, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
1) Research and innovation framework programs (Horizon 2020, FP9). 
 
2) Initiatives relating to energy, sustainability and education.
organisation_name: Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences (IVA)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: To promote technical and economic sciences, and the development of enterprises, for the benefit of society.
relevant_communication:
The Academy runs many projects in areas such as research, innovation, education, sustainability and energy policies. IVA produces reports, seminars, policies documents etc. and works with many different stakeholders. 
 
Most activities are on the national level. However some are on the EU level. In particular those concerning research policy.
